name: Psyco Maps
author: Carmine De santis

sections.description:
Psyco maps is a very simple plugin to use, it allows you to create google maps directly from posts or pages with one or more markers with personalized title.

Advantages

  • Create maps directly in page/post
  • No useless js / css which can slow down the speed of page/post
  • Use your custom json for maps style
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin

  1. Upload ‘psyco-maps.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Insert the Api of Google maps in psyco maps menu
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

How to install the plugin

  1. Upload ‘psyco-maps.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Insert the Api of Google maps in psyco maps menu

Where I find google API

Go to https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key and click on generate key

How to create maps

Go to posts/page; add marker and your custom setting, click on generate maps and copy shortcode and paste it in the content of your page/post
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Updated the new style for admin
  • Fix bug for .hidden class on dash
  • Now plugin acts only on post and page
